[官網] 後衛艾維斯和邦路斯昨晚因傷離場，目前，兩人已經接受了初步的體檢。

艾維斯受傷後被立即送往醫院，經診斷，巴西人的左腿腓骨骨折。邦路斯則是出現了大腿拉傷的情況。球會目前沒有公佈兩名球員傷癒時間, 會在未來幾天將會持續關注兩人的傷病進展情況。

意大利媒體表示，祖雲達斯的引援目標韋素正在考慮來自上海上港的巨額報價。

韋素今年夏天就接近加盟祖雲，不過這筆轉會在轉會市場關閉前破產。這名比利時中場原本可能會在冬歇期時加盟祖雲達斯，不過上海上港不久前接觸了這名比利時國腳，他們為韋素開出了巨額報價。

上港主帥波阿斯在2014年執教辛尼特時，曾和韋素有過合作，意大利天空體育稱，韋素正在考慮上港的報價。

據悉，上港將為韋素開出一份為期四年，總年薪為7200萬歐元的合同。

【now.com體育】今季在祖雲達斯不受重用的老牌左閘艾夫拿回歸闊別11年的法甲，加盟馬賽。

35歲的艾夫拿（Patrice Evra）於周四進行體測，要是順利通過的話，將會和馬賽簽下一張1年半的合約。現於法甲排第7位的馬賽由前羅馬教頭魯迪加西亞執教，據知今次球隊是擊敗了水晶宮和里昂，獲得這名老將來投。

艾夫拿在2014年加盟祖雲達斯，至今贏得2次意甲、2次意盃，更在2015助「老婦人」殺入歐聯決賽，最終不敵巴塞隆拿。當然，艾夫拿的職業生涯最光輝是效力曼聯的8季，在轉投祖雲達斯前，他為「紅魔」捧走5次英超、3次英聯盃、1次歐聯和1次世冠盃。

曾效力尼斯和摩納哥的艾夫拿，今次可說是鳥倦知還，而且在新東家也有不少來自英超的球員，如前鋒巴菲迪比高美斯和中場狄亞拉等。

韋斯咸翼鋒皮耶也盛傳即將加盟。

自從回巢皇家馬德里後，西班牙射手莫拉達再次離隊的消息，便不絕於耳。日前，西班牙權威媒體COPE電台指出，莫拉達熱切希望於今年內離開銀河艦隊，皆因他認為自己經已受騙！



該媒指出，半季過後，莫拉達對於自己仍未能夠穩佔主力位置而感到不滿，他已命令經理人為其安排轉會，準備於今夏他投。甚至有消息指出，莫拉達不希望與施丹共事，並認為法國球王是存心欺騙自己，沒有向他兌現安排正選席位的承諾。

雖然後備上陣居多，但莫拉達迄今已代表皇馬於各項賽事上陣24次（11次正選），並收獲9個入球。

我係00-01開始迷上祖記

當年因為陣容星光熠熠所吸引
有施丹、迪比、大恩、戴維斯
同埋euro00黃金入球既查仔

當年贏唔到聯賽
肥安落獲，納比回歸
賣施丹，入尼維特、保方同杜林
尼維特拼命三郎精神
加上查仔既射手入球保證
顯得比00-01變左實而不華
反而更吸引，更欣賞球會眼光

02-03歐聯4強完勝鍠馬
尼維特領黃牌坐係度喊仍然瀝瀝在目
(8強作客巴塞，薩拉耶達個球都好經典)

之後睇住祖記興衰
直至干地先起死回生
衰d講句，11-12係贏得有點狗屎運

感嘆講句
近10年黎講，屌帥算最好既領隊
戰術夠多變化，又發揮到球員潛能
最緊要佢係夠低調
上年16強對拜仁真係睇到嘩嘩聲
可惜係只差個幾分鐘失守
我真心希望佢繼續教落去架

唔係話干地唔好
當年既佢戰術又保守
歐戰成績又肉酸
成日淨係埋怨球會同威脅唔撈
之不過祖記復興佢有一定功勞既
好高興睇得出佢之後係意大利同車仔
戰術層面真係升左level既

Morata: 'Beating Napoli would be sweet'

Alvaro Morata admits beating Napoli in the Champions League would be sweeter given his Juventus past.

The Real Madrid forward played for the Old Lady for two seasons, winning the League and Cup double in both of them, before returning to his boyhood club last summer.

However, the 24-year-old has fond memories of his time in Serie A and is adamant he would have wanted to stay a lot longer had Los Blancos not exercised their right to re-sign him.

"I am not Italian, but I gave everything for the Bianconero shirt and I was willing to stay there many years," Morata said during an interview with Corriere Dello Sport.

"Juventus knew that, the only problem was that Madrid had been my dream since when I was little. Without the buy back option, you would have had to drive me to get me away from Turin!"

Morata added that he has a lot to thank the Italian core of Juventus players for in helping him succeed with the Bianconeri.

"I miss the Italian group from the dressing room - Bonucci, Barzagli, Chiellini, Marchisio, Buffon, they were key in my adaptation to Juventus and Turin.

"If I had come into a bad dressing room at Juventus, I wouldn't have done so well."

Talk then turned to next week's Champions League Round of 16 first leg with Napoli, with the Spaniard acknowledging the Partenopei are dangerous opponents but expressing his desire to get one over on Maurizio Sarri's team.

"We can't wait to play Napoli. They play the ball with their feet very well and their front three of Callejon, Hamsik and Insigne are very dangerous.

"Then, there is Pavoletti and Milik who will also try to be there. They are a great team, this year they don't seem to be challenging for the League so they could be even better in Europe.

"They can beat us, but we can also beat them. That's the magic of the Champions League.

"I always want to win, but I admit I would be even happier to beat Napoli because of my Juventino past."

Finally, Morata admitted to mixed feelings over the possibility of a final between Juve and Madrid.

"Would I sign for a Real Madrid-Juventus final? Juve are Juve and they always aspire to the maximum. I admit I wouldn't like it, but just to be there I would sign for it.

"If I had to lose a final, I would prefer to lose against Juventus over losing to other teams. But now we need to focus on Napoli. If we think about a hypothetical final, Napoli will send us home."

Morata: 'Beating Napoli would be sweet'

Alvaro Morata admits beating Napoli in the Champions League would be sweeter given his Juventus past.

The Real Madrid forward played for the Old Lady for two seasons, winning the League and Cup double in both of them, before returning to his boyhood club last summer.

However, the 24-year-old has fond memories of his time in Serie A and is adamant he would have wanted to stay a lot longer had Los Blancos not exercised their right to re-sign him.

"I am not Italian, but I gave everything for the Bianconero shirt and I was willing to stay there many years," Morata said during an interview with Corriere Dello Sport.

"Juventus knew that, the only problem was that Madrid had been my dream since when I was little. Without the buy back option, you would have had to drive me to get me away from Turin!"

Morata added that he has a lot to thank the Italian core of Juventus players for in helping him succeed with the Bianconeri.

"I miss the Italian group from the dressing room - Bonucci, Barzagli, Chiellini, Marchisio, Buffon, they were key in my adaptation to Juventus and Turin.

"If I had come into a bad dressing room at Juventus, I wouldn't have done so well."

最強經理人分析：依家既4231陣係唔適台dybala 原因：
首先講講位置
--------------希古恩-----------
文迪-------戴巴-------古亞
戴巴拿正正係cf位 又要有希古恩係正前面
即係戴巴要做影子前鋒 呢個位置好考驗球員既禁區既入球意識 依家最top既世界級執雞射手有豐澤驅 葛斯 湯馬士梅拿 莫拉達等等 戴巴拿最擅長係扭波過人同射門等等 加上扭波係需要比較多空間先發揮比較好 依家既4231令到中間既進攻密集左 對手亦會因為咁而注重左中間既防守 戴巴拿除左發揮少左 攻擊點太多比人分工分左上波時間 呢個陣既攻擊重心放哂落希古恩 同要求後面3個盡量要供應同支援前面既1而益哂希古恩之外 戴巴拿係密集既位置中做影子前鋒要做比人係禁區內除時比人踢跌既角色 因為影子前鋒通觸住瞬間同執雞既機會 射球果刻就會引來防手球員既魯莽同粗野欄截 好明顯戴巴拿體格唔夠硬 呢個位置仲會易傷 所以戴巴拿唔係一個禁區騎士 佢係禁區既站位唔係最好 個人認為最主要既原因係因為佢既能力令佢覺得唔洗一定要執雞先至入到波 令到佢係禁區既意識未係最top果批 由佢係上場比賽因為位置企後左所以飛身去頂球既準繩度下降左 仲有佢係禁區比人踢跌顯示佢對抗性可以睇到 呢個位置係唔太適合佢 要改邊呢個問題 一係就比佢踢古亞達度個位 但係就唔可以善用哂手上晚球員 所以最好就係踢433 比佢做最前既前鋒 或者做右邊鋒 咁就可以完全解放戴巴拿 希望4231係為左轉433前做準備同比前鋒唔夠出場率比下佢地多d出場機會既暫時陣式

迪巴拿：我快要和祖雲續約了
祖雲達斯前鋒迪巴拿證實，他已經非常接近要與祖雲完成續約了。

迪巴拿與祖雲達斯的續約談判持續了幾個月的時間，此前有媒體報導稱迪巴拿並不打算早早與祖雲完成續約。

迪巴拿在接受天空體育採訪時對此問題予以了回應：“我們雙方已經很接近要完成續約了。現在就剩下一些小小的細節沒敲定了，我的經紀人會來意大利與馬路達就這些細節進行溝通與確認，續約是我們雙方的意願。”

在最近幾周的比賽中迪巴拿頻繁被換下，他有可能打破迪比亞路一個賽季被卡比路19次換下場的紀錄嗎？

“他們和我聊過這個，可能我會主動要求被換下了，打破迪比亞路的出場和入球紀錄並不容易，所以如果我不去阻止教練這麼做的話，至少我還能打破迪比亞路一項紀錄！”迪巴拿調侃道。

不過，《Le10sport》認為，一旦巴黎能夠於華拉堤身上，收回8000萬歐元的轉會費，他們亦不介意與潛在買家，就「新派路」的轉會開啟談判。

日前，意大利媒體《都靈體育報》指出，意大利名將派路將於掛靴後，回到祖雲達斯工作，擔任形象大使一職。



2015年夏天，派路從祖雲達斯轉投紐約城FC，而在效力斑馬軍團的4年之內，他先後協助球隊四奪意甲冠軍，早早獲得老婦人球迷的鼎力支持。若能在掛靴後回歸祖雲達斯，相信一眾球迷均會相當歡迎派路的決定。

雖然目前尚未有任何的跡象，表示派路或於今夏退役，但祖雲達斯經已計劃在此子掛靴後，邀請他回巢。
